1111211.title: Jake's Gaining. How Does It Happen?

11112111.content:
One day Jake was keeping the magical world as separate as possible from the human world, in this case with an artifact. The artifact in question was an oil lamp that acted like an actual genie’s lamp. It was called the Lamp of Leprada, a dead wizard who attempted to use the Lamp as a trap & binding agent for capturing other magical creatures inside, torturing them to coerce cooperation with the wielder, and force them to grant his desires. The Lamp of Leprada was about to trade hands with a shady pawnshop, who most likely knows nothing about its true power. Jake’s mission was to retrieve the lamp before any wishes were made.

At the moment Jake flying invisibly to the naked eye (a new trick that is part of his shapeshifting abilities which he has now fully unlocked) prepared to sneak into the shop and retrieve, pardon liberate the goods that weren’t supposed to be there in the first place. At this point in Jake’s life he was 17-years-old & a junior in high school. Jake was feeling both exhausted & hungry from all of his latest missions to protect the magical community of New York. Jake was beginning to feel the pressure & was bound to crack at some point.

Just last week, he had to organize the annual festival between the pixies living in the toy factory (they helped make toys resembling themselves for children), & the brownies in the bakery (they loved sneaking crumbs & pastry ingredients out, especially brownies for obvious reasons). They were two different types of Fair Folk living in New York that were so similar in some respects, yet so different in others. The week before that, the centaur clans in the underground markets needed help building a new tunnel to gallop through, so as not to arouse suspicion from humans with their activities, or interfere with the goblins and trolls operations who shared similar tunnel networks.

& the week before that Eli Excelsior Pandarus had struck a deal with several dark sorcerers to form a coven to take over the world by sacrificing powerful families of magical species. Pandarus’s plan was built up years in advance since his previous defeat by Jake & Spud. Pandarus’s recent plan required him to sacrifice a mother, father, & only child of a powerful family per magical creature species (all species are included), at the same time with their darkest magic being the catalyst that would spark their newfound amplified transcendent wizardry; but I digress.

Jake had been pushed to the near physical breaking point through all the accumulated disasters & machinations, leaving him with a lot of all-nighters, frequent social outings missed, & homework that needed to be finished unless he wants to repeat a grade like Brad Morton did. Jake was especially mad because Brad Morton was still in the same school as him, granted he was only allowed to continue his education & bullying due to his football jock status. Brad was even more relentless than he was in middle school. Throughout all of his trials & tribulations, Jake was beginning to wish he had never been the American Dragon, so he could enjoy life more as an ordinary teenager, or at least get some reprieve until he graduated high school. A wish he would soon have the chance to grant himself.

As Jake broke in undetected, he found the Lamp of Leprada inside of a vault in the back of the shop. Jake reminisced what was the last nail in the coffin for his choice, the day he & Rose broke up about a year ago as they both felt they “needed to see other people” to branch their horizons as they grew apart. Jake realized he had a chance to grant his wish, so after grabbing the lamp, he went to his secret place to make his wish away from prying eyes & ears, even those of his family & friends.

“Here it is goes.” Jake made a deal with the last souls inside of the Lamp of Leprada that he would take the lamp with him to free their tormented bodies & souls from the lamp after granting final wish, his of course. “I wish I had never been the American Dragon”. Then after the lamp began to vibrate & heat up, a magical fire came out & swallowed the world as Jake felt hotter than he’d ever been in his life thinking maybe this was the wrong relic as he saw the light. Not realizing this was just a part of his wish getting granted.

How does Jake’s wish get granted? One: to make sure Jake had never been the American Dragon, his parents never met & gave birth to him, but he still exists as an orphan adopted by a wealthy family, despite the paradox thus meaning he had. “NEVER BEEN the American Dragon”. This means he has no magical heritage or responsibilities; he is gay, & wants to be fattened into immobility; with a new circle of friends to help him accomplish his goals; & his friends & family as well as the people who knew him wouldn’t recognize him at all as he had never met them in this timeline.

Two: Jake’s parents never met & Jake just doesn’t exist period, instead being sent to a limbo dimension where unborn souls of stillbirths as well as those who have been erased via time travel paradoxes, live out their fantasies in a new reality they can never leave to prevent more paradoxes from destroying all of the time-space continuum. In this reality Jake made himself the halfling child of a wizard on his dad’s side, & his mom was a human. Jake is powerful enough to make himself fatter & beloved at the cost of regular human’s free-will. This includes his posse of new “friends” & “feeders” who keep him company & fed without realizing they have no other choice, as Jake’s parents are important people who practically run the New York criminal underbelly without alerting the Magical World of their activities.

Three: Jake is sent granted this wish by being put into a perpetual dream state through the power of a family baku who existed inside the lamp. The Baku is an immortal, shapeshifting entity capable of eating dreams of other sentient beings (in particular humas) by granting them their greatest desires to keep them trapped for psychic sustenance similar to the Black Mercy from DC comics. While this is happening, the family of Baku Jake releases from lamp gets stronger & begin to trap New York City into a perpetual nightmare, with Jake’s friends trying desperately to wake him from his slumber. In this dream, Jake is born a human who lives a spoiled rotten life by his new rich parents, who keep him happy by having him homeschooled. Jake also has a harem of muscle boys to have bara sex with who dote on his every need. So how does Jake’s wish get granted? Option 1, Option 2, Option 3.

11123222222111111.content:
(Ben's POV)
My name is Benjamin Kirby Tennyson, & I'm 10-years-old. It was time for another awesome summer vacation with Grandpa Max & my lame cousin Gwen. All I wanted was to make some new friends since I've never made one before. It might have been because of my weight. I'm around 150 & really out of shape, so I use crutches to get around. Gwen often chastises me for my gluttony & girth, but I don't think I look unattractive, in fact it makes me feel empowered & handsome for my age. Still, I wish other people could get to know the real me & we could hang out & whatnot, but I'm always a laughing stock for my obesity, coupled with my short size made me look like a squished gumdrop. But I digress...

I was picked up from school with Gwen & went to our first stop on our road trip, a camping trip at a nearby site. I went on my own to try & exercise per orders of Gwen, just to get her out of my face. I hobbled along when I nearly tripped & as I was getting up, I saw a meteorite about to crash into me. "AAAuuugghh!" I screamed. Then the meteorite stopped in place & fell down quickly with enough momentum to make me lose my balance. I fell backwards & saw that it wasn't a small meteorite, but a black orb of metal & circuits, like something out of an alien movie. It opened up to reveal this weird bit of armor with a digital screen like a computer, no, a wrist watch. I was captivated by the alien watch, so I touched it & the watch wrapped around me & as it vibrated & glowed, I felt an unusual drowsiness fall under my eyes & I plopped asleep on the spot, while I felt it well, I guess the best word to use would be that it bound itself to my swollen wrist without cutting off circulation.
As I slept & started to dream, I heard a voice calling out to me. "Ben. Bennn. Bennnnn... Wake up.” As I awoke, I opened my heavy eyelids.

“Where am I?” Then I stirred when I realized I was floating in what could only be described as a Zero-G dimension, I certainly wasn’t on earth anymore. Then I wiped some sweat off of my forehead & saw the alien watch from earlier. “Whoa! Why’s that weird alien watch on my arm??” Then I tugged at it but felt a shock go through me, “Okay, better question, why is the watch stuck to my arm???” Then the watch stretched around me like a liquid blanket of metal under my clothes, till I was naked. “Hey!!” I said bashfully.

“Calm yourself Benjamin Kirby Tennyson. I am here to help you unlock your dreams.” the voice called out to me, closer than before. That’s when I realized that it wasn’t just coming from anywhere, it was right on me, it came from the alien watch. “Yes I am an alien human lifeform. Now, you are probably wondering, why is this alien watch talking to me? Or how is it talking to me? Or where I came from? Well I will answer all your questions if you let me bond to your nervous system, or in human anatomy, your brain. I will always be there to protect you & help you accomplish your desires... So are you ready to be bigger, befriended, & bully-free?” Wow, this was so cool, I had an alien watch at my disposal & now I could probably do whatever I wanted. “Watch bond with me & grant me my desires.”

"Excellent. Beginning genetic bonding of omnitrix to organic vessel. What is your designation?” The Omnitrix, as it was called asked me.

“Ben Tennyson!!! or Ben 10 for short.”

“Very well, then where shall I be placed on your body for manual mode?”

“Um, can you explain that a bit more?”

“Certainly. It means that if you or someone you trust needs to activate the omnitrix manually should your neurosystems become compromised, this will need to be an easy to access part of your external body.”

“Well in that case, I choose to wear you as an unremovable headband so I can control you with my thoughts. Next question… How are you powered & what do you do to grant my desires?”

“I am powered, by a sub-nuclear nearly limitless bio-energy that self recharges. & as for what I do, I do many functions, G.P.S., telecommunications, genetic modifications by infusing alien DNA via a complex bio-energy system, telepathy, & technological manipulation. Next question.

"Okay, Why am I naked?" I asked trying desperately to hold onto the rags that are my clothes to spare my dignity.

"You technically aren't naked, you are being covered by a non-stick, breathable, flexible, & disguisable gel clothes for now so I can grant your desires. So now it’s my turn to ask you the questions… What do you want?”

“I want to be so freakin’ fat, that I can’t move a single external muscle without you to move it for me so I can do anything, communicating, eating, sleeping, bathing, & playing. I want to find like-minded friends my age who would love to be with me just for me so I can one day share that power with them & make their desires come true. & I want to make sure that NO ONE, tries to hurt me, my friends, my family, or spoil my wishes & fun-filled desires.”

“I can do the first two, but the third one will be tricky without time & I need to make direct & prolonged contact with your friends & family's skin to do so. So ready to gain weight???" I was so giddy.

"Of course omnitrix. Hit me. Oh, & alow gain over the summer & isolate Gwen & Grandpa Max so you can 'change' their perspectives about my bigness."

"As you wish, master." Master, I liked where this was going... I awoke with a start inside the Rust Bucket. I started to feel extremely, hungry, like I could eat a dozen boulders & an entire forest of plant life just to sate my appetite. My body became slightly stronger & slightly faster, then I opened my mouth &...
11123222222111111.title: Big Ben, Bigger Beginnings

111232222221111111.content:
I felt my innards feel contorted & fused together into a single organ. Then I knew what to do, I opened my mouth & these tentaculous tongues came out & grabbed nearby plant matter & dirt, which I then consumed liking the taste. I swallowed & felt it compress & digest, I did this in a blinding hunger state till I cleared out at least a dozen trees & 70 cubic feet of soil in the same place. “Oh that feels good, now what Omnitrix?”

“Now I must revert you to your original state, though the food will be processed into pure caloric energy & instantly assimilated as fat while your clothes & crutches grow with you. As for how to explain this to your escorts, I sent a subtle psionic call to them to find you, so sit down pretending to be near collapse from exhaustion & they will carry you back to the ‘Rust Bucket’. While they are carrying you, you must drape your arms & hands around their heads making skin-to-skin or skin-to-hair contact. Then focus on what you want them to think about your changes & each time you do it, it will slowly rewrite their minds so that you will have an accepting family.” the Omnitrix explained monotonously.

As I glowed & turned back into a human, I saw my body grow even wider & fatter & than before, I was already 150 lb. with a 20 in. waist, now I must be at least 275 lb., with a 30 in. waist, plus a bigger gut, plushier moobs, & a rounder butt. I was exhausted but I knew this was just the beginning of my girth, I mean growth. So squatted down noticing I appeared fully clothed, minus my sack-like arms which were exposed for my wish to come true.

“Ben! Ben!! Bennnn!!!!” Gwen shouted then she saw me & looked shocked. “Ben, Ben, are you okay???” She asked with genuine kindness & concern.

“No, I’m not, I feel like I can’t stay standing.” I panted, then I faked a fall on my butter butt, & Grandpa Max tried to lift me up around his neck,.

“Easy Ben, we’ll get you back to camp.” Grandpa Max reassured me, not that it was needed. “Gwen since this long exercise excursion was your idea,” Grandpa Max said almost harshly. I kind of felt sorry for Gwen when I saw the look on her face, sure she’s a doofus, but Grandpa didn’t have to be so cold. “I suggest you take off Ben’s clothes & we help him cool off once we get back to the Rust Bucket”.

“What?!?!?!?!?” Gwen’s reaction was priceless, but I concealed my feelings well enough. “But Grandpa, I know I wish Ben wasn’t in such a bad state, but I can’t undress my own cousin, that would be, well weird… & besides Ben’s too heavy to undress.” Gwen protested.

“No buts, I think we really need to reconsider if this is what Ben wants in life. So help me carry him back.” Grandpa Max responded adamantly. I knew the Omnitrix was doing its job well enough, but I had to keep on focusing on the ideals I wanted my family to be. Grandpa Max, being a chunky sort of person, was well in empathy of my plight, despite only being obese when he became a senior citizen, but he was always supporting of me, so he would be easy to convert.

“Fine.” Gwen replied in defeat. “Ready to stand Ben?”

“Sure Okay, help me up & I’ll try to waddle the rest of the way. Oh & Gwen.”

“Yes Ben.”

“Could I put my arm around your head, so I have something strong to support me?” Gwen was even more baffled, but she silently conceded by letting me put my oil pipe sized arm around her head. I focused on both tasks at hand; waddling back to camp, & rewriting the feelings Gwen has for me, using subtle empathy with my feelings being dominant. I wanted someone who could completely be a helpful & supporting family member. With each step I waddled, I felt closer to my goal of earning Gwen’s understanding, but telepathically, the Omnitrix told me otherwise, it turns out it’s true that when you exercise you can repeat information faster in your head. Repeating the information in my head will help the process along & luckily I took a long walk out of camp before finding the Omnitrix, so I made a lot of progress...

1112322222211111112.content:
After returning to the R.V. I slept like a baby for the first time in months not thinking about how I could lose weight. Now I could focus on my weight gain & making new friends. My first new friend was an older kid named Kevin, we found him pickpocketing us off of the streets of New York City, & boy was he in bad shape. He was deathly pale, raggedy gothic clothes, only a little bit taller than me, but cadaverously skinny, with little to no muscle tone, & he seemed almost desperate, behind a cynical mask of rage. I knew I could help him, part of me just clicked knowing I'd be doing something good by helping this poor soul find happiness. Grandpa Max apprehended him & we were brought into the police station to question him. It turned out that Kevin ran away from his mom's house after having a falling-out with his step-dad. He accidentally caused the house to blow up & his step-dad blamed him for it, in a moment of sadness & grief thinking his mother didn't want him anymore, Kevin stole a few jewels, money, & a knife from his step-dad, & left on the lamb. After we were questioned, we were asked if we were to press charges, I convinced grandpa to decline if we were to help rehabilitate him. We had him taken by handcuff to the Rust Bucket, where a tracer was placed on him, & when the police left, Grandpa told us some shocking information.

"So Ben, Gwen, there's something I need to tell you. I'm not just your average plumber, I'm actually an agent for a secret protection organization known as the Plumbers for earth & other planets out there." Grandpa shocked us all, even Kevin, when he showed us the cool technical details of the Rust Bucket that was well hidden. It was like looking at something from a science-fiction movie, but it was all real.

"Is that a Cerebrocrustacean hospital bed, with all the latest features Mr. Tennyson" Kevin asked with certainty.

“Wait, how did you know that was alien technology? & what’s a Cerebrocrustacean?” Gwen asked baffled for once.

“A Cerebrocurstacean is a crab-based alien race that is usually full of intellectual minds & sharpened electrical energy powers. & I know this because my dad was a plumber too, & now that I mention it, he always mentioned someone named Magister Tennyson.

“Really Kevin…” Grandpa Max pondered while scratching his chin. “What was your dad’s name?”

“Well it was Devin Levin…” Kevin responded shyly.

“That’s why you look so familiar!!! Devin was my Osmosian apprentice before he di… I mean perished during that mission” Grandpa Max responded solemly. Kevin looked surprised, he didn’t know this.

“So um Mr. Tennyson… What do you mean my dad perished during ‘THAT MISSION’?” My mom told me he was dead in a lab accident he was trying to evacuate.” Kevin quipped.

Grandpa Max looked nervous, “Huh, well Kevin I don’t think any of you are ready yet to know because it is very disturbing how he died. Besides we’re running late to reach Mt. Rushmore. There I have some Plumber Tech for helping Ben get around without exerting himself too much… I’ll leave you three in the back to enjoy the ride & have some snacks.” Grandpa Max responded & left us with at least a two dozen jumbo-sized bags of chips & cookies. Things went kind of silently awkward for a while now so I decided to break the ice.

“So Kevin, your dad is an Osmosian, right Kevin?” I asked & he nodded yes. “So do they have any unusual powers?”

“Yep, besides absorbing energy, I’ve heard they can manipulate most inorganic matter through direct contact (flesh-on-flesh) & they can manipulate the hormones of humans & other organic species. It’s incredible but it has a dark side, one I know from experience & I’m kind of scared to use it again…” Kevin responded scared & sad.

“What’s the dark side Osmosian powers, & why would you know from experience. IT’s not like you’ve deliberately used these powers to hurt other beings right???” I asked jokingly. But Kevin didn’t take that too well & just frowned even sadder than before.

“Well you see different kind of Osmosians can absorb different forms of energy: thermal, electric, psionic, nuclear, heck even life-force energy. In cases with energy from machines & natural occurrences, I can loose control & hurt people by amplifying it with my own life force & hurt people, the more joules it has, or energy units, the more dangerous.” Kevin explained.

“Wow that’s bad.” I responded grimly.

“It get’s even worse. When I absorb different forms of energy from a living organic being like life-force energy… I can’t control how much or how quickly it drains. The benefit allows me to absorb a weaker (about 30%) but still substantial version of their powers, bu the cost is I could literally kill them or damage their very essence whether it be genetics or energy frequencies in the case of pure-energy beings. I almost blew up my mom & step-dad’s house & got close to killing several people, aliens, and assorted small animals to keep me alive while I was on the run. It, it, it was horrible!!!” Kevin panted close to tears. “I could hear the voices of every being I’ve ever absorbed energy from.” I must’ve gasped at this because Kevin looked at me with an even more pained expression on his face than before.

“I couldn’t control it, people thought i was a freak, so i became a monster & tried to hurt people when I pick-pocketed them or worked with gang activity in New York city. I don’t know if my mom could ever forgive me for what I’ve done, I don’t know why you & your family seem to be so forgiving, especially knowing all I’ve done.” Kevin finally burst into tears there & then, & though I was mostly immobile & Gwen didn’t know him, Kevin just need a hug & a shoulder to cry on. I thought my life was bad, but looking at Kevin’s puts everything into perspective. I had a decent life, but Kevin & his kind, the homeless, the orphans, & the forsaken of not just Earth, but every world deserve a second chance, & at a better life. I knew now what I could do with my Omnitrix, but first. I tried to use my minuscule strength to get up & hug Kevin. Gwen saw my struggles & gently pushed Kevin into my warm, soft moobs, I mean chest. As Kevin sobbed, he looked up at me with a warm, wonderful smile on his face, & wiped his tears away, then he…

11123222222111111121.content:
Kevin touched my torso where my belly button was exposed by my snug shirt, then I felt a weird sloshing, gurgling, and cold sensation from the part of my body made contact with Kevin. It was okay at first, a little cold, but as it got uncomfortable, I started noticing my fatigue.

“Ben you okay, you don’t look so good. & you know you shouldn’t be standing for so long, even if it is for a hug.” Gwen pointed out tactfully. That’s when I noticed I was sweating from every pore in my body, close to panting in my breathing rate, & about to collapse on my knees from fatigue.

Then I felt the Omnitrix speak inside my brain & it spoke to me. “Ben 10, it seems that the Osmosian physiology of your older companion is accidentally sucking not just metabolic & caloric energy, but life-force energy from your system. If this continues you could suffer severe damage. Suggested tactic, allow me to protect you by creating a breathable, but protective forcefield around you, so that every time the Osmosian tries to touch you, he won’t absorb energy from you, but rather from my near-limitless supply of energy. Awaiting orders.

“Do it, but make sure nothing happens to Kevin’s body or mind, at least nothing that is permanent.” I responded in though within 30 seconds.

“Very well. Activating forcefield.” Then I felt a pulse of energy surround me & shock Kevin.

“Aaaauuugh!” Kevin shouted as if he were shocked by a massive bolt of static electricity. The Omnitrix surrounded me with a green spherical barrier, much to Gwen’s surprise. Kevin was knocked back, slightly charred on his fingertips, & somewhat shocked, but still he was somehow fine which was a relief to me.

“Keee-vvvin!!!” I shouted exhausted, as I was also regaining my balance & catching my breath while landing on my butter butt. “I-I-I-I’m so sorry Kevin, I-I-I-I d-d-d-d-didn’t mean to hurt you.”

“What’s going on back there?!?!” Grandpa Max burst in through the curtains of our living spaces (after he left of course during our previous conversation) & looked at all three of us in surprise and shock. “Gwen, answers, NOW?!?!?!?” Grandpa Max exclaimed.

“Ben. Hugs Kevin. Energy Feedback. Forcefield. Singed Kevin” Gwen tried to explain calmly.

What?!?!? Ben where did this forcefield come from, & why is it helping you now?” Grandpa Max asked quizzically.

“Okay but let me catch my breath, since I’m a little winded from the experience myself.” I gasped then after a minute or two my system was regulating itself normally. “Well I guess the cat’s out of the bag. I found this strange looking watch from a meteor in the woods. So I cleaned it up it sort of well bonded itself to me. Next thing I knew I’m awake, naked, & it was turning into a protective device for my forehead, & then (wait for it), it spoke to me, INSIDE my mind.”

“What?!??!?!” everyone looked at me like I was from another planet. Anyway I continued to explain recent events at our first campsite, & all my dreams in all honesty. & for the first time ever, I felt like I belonged with my family & Kevin figured out that even though he’s given up on bad behavior, his powers must still be active & it must have been slowly draining me of my energy during that long hug. Any longer & it would have killed me, but the Omnitrix intervened & shocked Kevin with energy he can’t absorb to push him away while protecting me with a barrier.

“Wow this is incredible!!!” Gwen responded, “You could change the world Ben”

“All in all, as interesting as it may be, I hope you take this power responsibly.” Grandpa Max commented.

“Don’t worry I wouldn’t dream of it, as long as I have my supporting family & my friends like Kevin. Well we’ll change the world without hurting anyone. Isn’t that right Kevin?”

“What! Well of course Benji. You’re my buddy for life & you standing up for me means a lot.” Kevin replied with zeal & admiration.

“Great because meeting you has changed my whole perspective on my life & the lives others must have. I thought I should use this power to help me in my dreams so long as they don’t infringe negative effects upon others civilians or innocent beings. But after meeting you Kevin & hearing your story, I realize I have to branch out & share t'my power with others who need it & deserve the right to use it to help others & themselves. That’s my new goal, Expanding the World’s Freedom & Compassion, one pound at a time. & you guys are gonna be in it to help me out in the long haul” I explained.

“Of course Ben, I wouldn’t dream of it any other way. I just hope Carl & Sandra are okay with this.” Grandpa Max responded with worry.

“Don’t worry we’ll figure it out sooner or later. But in the meantime, let’s enjoy the summer vacation.” I responded by tapping Kevin on his shoulder. This was gonna be great, that’s when I noticed something happening to Kevin. He was transforming into an alien just like my forms. Must’ve been the side-effect the Omnitrix was talking about. What alien is he turning into???

111232222222222221111211121.content:
It was time for that school exchange program to happen I’d be working with new students from other schools for this semester & I’d meet new people & hopefully, dare-I-say-it, make friends. It feels like just yesterday I was enjoying the life of the circus, performing around the world, bedazzling audiences in awe of our amazing acrobatics, & having a family. Bruce took me in, & though he can never replace my parents, he really gives me comfort & understanding. Bruce thought it be best I try to mingle & mainstream myself instead of being cooped up here in the mansion or the Batcave, that’s right, Batcave, my adopted father is the freakin’ Batman. He avenged my parents & saved me from the orphanages & social workers, he is & always will be my hero.

Enough about me though, I was going to enter Gotham Academy with my butler Alfred taking me to the main office & exchanging paperwork & greeting the school officials. I thought this would be a hard day, I was wrong, it was a horrible day. I was instantly tripped up & outed as a nerd by the boys, & a potential hottie for the girls. I was known as Dick the Nerd for my clean-cut look, heavy backpack filled with books & a laptop, & my scrawny physique. This wasn’t a bad school, or even a sporty school, but even the nerds had a higher social status than me, though I figured it would only get worse when the other kids arrived from Central City & Happy Harbor. Then my day just started to shine when I was late to class & forced to sit at the back with two exchange students.

I didn’t know what it was at the time, but I knew I found something appealing about these two students, One was tall, black crew-cut hair, above average muscle-bound, with powerful upper body strength & a carved physique that screamed Adonis. His Adonis physique was only further exemplified by his XXL, but still tight Gotham Academy uniform that seemed scandalous yet daring . He seemed to give off a body language that said “I’m tough, & you better believe it!!!” The other was a tall & gangly with some lean muscle, messy red-head (or should I say bed-head) hair, with slightly a wrinkled Gotham Academy uniform. He was quickly sketching some graphic art I was admittedly impressed with though something seemed weird. It seemed that he was quickly drawing these strange rounded, globular, almost blobbish shapes then quickly erased them.

I introduced myself to them, “Huh…Huh…Hi I’m Dick.” I said almost instantly regretting that I was well-known around this school before the year began, & that my name though it sounded manly, was also very perversive.

The red head looked at me with a sense of decency & warmth, that was completely unexpected. “Dick, interesting name” he said holding back a chuckle. “Don’t worry I like you. My name’s Wally, Wally West don’ wear it out.” He said with frantic contained delight & constrained speed like he was about to speed babble. “Oh & this is my friend, Connor Kent.” he pointed to the caucasian Adonis.

“‘Sup.” he said in an almost passive fashion.

“Don’t mind him, he’s had a hard life” Wally said with surprise. “He was an orphaned for 10-years by an abortion plan gone wrong, he was resuscitated & then raised in some corrupt scientist’s lab for before he escaped out of Metropolis into Happy Harbor. Then his dad who he never knew was dragged into a court case & forced to take him in, they haven’t exactly been on good terms” Wally explained with sadness that he seemed to recognize, “Though between you & me, I think Connor’s dad is just scared & confused, Mr. Kent doesn’t hate Connor or not love him, i think he just was dragged into an unfamiliar setting & is trying to make the best of it.” Connor looked at Wally with a glare then it turned into a frown & a sad expression that was subtlety & conspicuous pain. I don’t know why but as Wally described this story, I didn’t feel sorry for Connor, I felt like I saw another side to Connor, like I was peeling back the hardened callous surface of Connor’s mind & seeing a warm & tender, but clearly broken heart. I wanted to give the guy a hug & tell him it’s alright, but I wasn’t any better off. My family was dead, & though Bruce tried, you didn’t need a doctorate’s degree in psychology or psychoanalysis or any of those psycho-degrees to know Bruce was clearly struggling trying to balance so much of his life into making a good family & also running Wayne enterprises. To be clear, he was Bruce Wayne, the head CEO of Wayne Enterprises, a conglomerate network of companies that extended a reach almost as far as Lex Corp & was founded right here in Gotham. He was kind of a show-off & playboy, but that was undermined by his many charity organizations, donations, & contributions to lower society with protection, homes, jobs, & monetary distribution that the city of Gotham wasn’t giving.

But I digress… I was talking with my new friends as we chatted about our lives, I talked with Wally & Connor & they wanted to talk to me in an unused classroom during the break period. “Okay so where to start, I”m Dick Grayson, ward & adopted son of Bruce Wayne, the Prince of Gotham” I introduced myself tentatively.

“Wait Dick Grayson!” Connor responded, “As in the last of the Flying Graysons, from Haley’s Circus.”

“Um, yes.” I said shyly.

“It’s okay dude. I think it’s great that you’ve been in the circus. I’m a little jealous actually.” Wally responded then nudged Connor in the ribs slowly, though it probably didn’t hurt much.

“Why would you think it’s wrong if you came from the circus?” Connor responded, he clearly didn’t know how to be social or interact in a normal environment, then Wally face palmed himself & asked if Connor & I could come over to his house near S,T.A.R. Labs in downtown Gotham. I told him for now it’d have to be him coming to me. I knew Bruce would be okay so long as they don’t cause too much trouble. They then shared some snacks with me during the nutrition, it was slightly fattening, but delicious pastries. School went by in a blur, then came the important question… Would Bruce allow me to go visit my new friend’s house or would he only allow them to come & visit.
111232222222222221111211121.title: Dick Nerd+Wally Jock/Connor Bad Boy=WG

1112322222222222211112111211.content:
"& this is my room" Wally opened the door to the a big mess of clothes, food wrappers, & comic books. All the clothes were wrinkled, the food wrappers empty of nothing but crumbs falling out, & the comic books were strewn in a random mess showing cool action scenes from the stories. All in all, despite the messiness of Wally's house, it was a good house. It smelled like a normal house should & it seemed more, well I guess the word "homey" would work, but it wouldn't come close to cutting it with this house. I was glad to meet Wally & Connor who liked me for who I was, Connor's subtle actions & deep frowns, it just seemed like they would be great friends. "Sorry about the mess, but this is as clean as it gets on such short notice... Anyway, my Aunty Iris is making cookies for us, so save room for dessert cause we West men eat a lot."

"Where are your parents again Wally?" I asked, almost instantly regretting it seeing the sad expression on his face.

"They're not able to make it. My dad's still in prison for child abuse, & my mom is in a rehabilitation center for alcoholics in Central City"

"Ooh, well I'm sorry I asked. Let's move on" I said awkwardly.

We had some snacks, played tag outside & talked for a little while. Then Connor asked me something I never would have expected to come out of his mouth, "So Dick, I'm wondering, is there anyone in class you love, I mean like?"

I was baffled by that statement, I hadn't thought about that before. But before I could awkwardly answer, Iris West came saying, "Snack time boys!!!" So I was saved by the snacks. Now I'll admit it, I like to eat a lot when I get the chance to, but never junkfood like chips or cookies or pastries, not very often at least. There were enough snacks for a family of eight to gorge on comfortably. I ate what I could watching Wally eat at such fast speeds with such vigor that I almost forgot he was a human being, not a vacuum or garbage disposal. Connor admittedly tried to keep composed about his hunger, but he still ate quite a lot more than me.

After half an hour, I started to feel sick. "Oooohhh!!!!"

"You okay Dick? You look a little green" Connor asked, & he was right, I was slighlty tinted & tinged with green, probably from eating so much. "Wally what do we do if Dick is sick?!?!?!" Connor shouted with worry.

"Don't worry *gulp*, we'll just go get some antacid for his stomach, you carry him there since you're taller & stronger & then we'll make Dick feel better." Wally responded relaxed

"Nooo." I groaned, "I'm fine just need to rest for a little bit"

"No-can-do Dick. Connor up-and-at-em'" Then Connor carried me over his shoulders & we went into kitchen & Iris gave me some antacids to drink. I'll admit, I've never had a stomachache, or stomach sickness, probably because I never ate that much before. When I looked down at my belly in the mirror, I saw a pale little bulge on my once flat childish torso. While I was slightly sleepy, Wally started to rub my belly, & it felt soooo good.

"Easy Dick, why don't you stay here for the night. We'll keep you company & comfortable until you wake up" Connor said with a concerned look on his face.

"Nooo, Bruce'll be worried, besides we have school tomorrow." I responded.

"It's okay Dickie-bird, it's just a Firday. Besides, I think some rest will do you some good." Wally reassured me with his soft voice. I drifted off to sleep. What happens next?
1112322222222222211112111211.title: It’s Okay, Binge with Boy/Friends @ West House

choices: Wally+Connor In My Bed, Hugging Me?
Bruce+Alfred Looking At Me With, Concern?
11123222222222222111121112111.content:
As I fell asleep I felt a weird sensation in my stomach and my, private parts. When I next opened my eyes, I was in a circus tent dressing room, could this be Haley’s circus. Could I be dreaming about my life here. Please not the night of their deaths. I tried to get up, but I noticed I couldn’t move my head any lower or even stand. It was like I was weighed down by a gelatinous mattress tied to my body. I shifted my body & noticed a jiggling sensation in my belly as it toppled a cup with the shockwave of my body in my “dressing room”. Wait I have a belly? “Hey what’s going on here. I heard my normally young & high-pitched voice go up into a lower octave tremor reverberate across the room then my parents came in. Yep it was a dream.

“Easy Richard. I know you’re hungry but you gotta wait for tonight’s show.” My dad assured me, then I noticed something, a full-body mirror in my line-of-sight. I was bulkier than I remembered. I looked less like an acrobat, & more like a circus fat man, well boy is more like it.

“Ummm mom, dad…” I asked, still surprised by the pitch of my voice.

“Yes Richard.” my mom asked.

“Why am I so well big? & what happened, last thing i remember was sleeping off a lot of snacks at a friends house in Gotham” reminisced.

“Easy does it boyo. I think you must be having another food coma-induced dream. Which has happened before, but don’t worry Richard, whatever weird dreams you’re having, it’s not real.” Dad responded.

“What your father is trying to say in his own round-a-bout way Richard is that you’ve always been a, well ‘bigger’ boy, & that your dreams of these friends are probably just figments of your imagination induced by all the good food you’ve eaten all at once.

“Wait, are you saying these weird dreams that feel so real are just fugue states from my food comas. I remember strange things, memories like another lifetime ago, none of it was real; me being an acrobat like you guys, your deaths at the hands of that extortion racket by Tony Zucco, my adoption by that billionaire Bruce Wayne, the time I spent in public school, & now meeting two great friends. Was it all some sort of cruel, sick joke?!?!” I shouted in my deep voice, my parents were slightly stunned at this.

“Richard it’s okay I don’t know what’s going on but we’ll talk about it after the show. Maybe it’s real, maybe it’s not, but one constant is true in both of these well ‘worlds’ Richard, we love you now, & we always will look out for you. Now let’s get you prepared for your big performance.” Mom spoke calmly, then gave my dad a look I couldn’t see, though it was probably something along the lines of “Honey, help me out here”

“So now that we’ve all taken a deep breath, is there any questions you’d like to know about your life before we go on stage son? We’d hoped you would grow out of it into a light, & spectacular acrobat. But your body wanted to be bigger, so we improvised and you’re now our circus fat man, well boy but you get the idea.”

“Now then let’s get you onstage Richard for your next performance. You’ve got to eat your entire body weight in fattening foods within half an hour. You hungry big boy?” Dad remarked playfully while gently patting my belly.

“You know it dad.” I responded. Strange as this dream was I let it play out, right until the end of the show where I finished eating all 200 lb. of fattening food and entered a food coma. When the dizzying but wonderfully full sensation ended, I was awake, but who did I see?
11123222222222222111121112111.title: Dick’s Delightful Dream of Girth & Gluttony

11133111121.content:
(Peter Parker's P.O.V.)
My life has been getting better since I met Parker Porter, yes I'm well aware of his first name being my last & the irony around being friends with someone like that, but it gets weirder. However before we meet Parker, let's start out on the day my life changed. Several months ago I was on a field trip to my best bud Harry's dad's laboratory for his company Oscorp where they were testing genetics on harmless spiders when one snuck out & painlessly nipped at me. I only noticed it only because I saw it bite my hand, but I didn't do anything about it because I felt compelled to see where it went. After school that day I started feeling feverish & exhausted so I had Aunt May call me in sick & I stayed home for eight straight days. I wasn't in a coma or anything, or in extreme pain, I was just really tired & it felt like i was having my innards rearranged slowly over that time, but that wasn't even the weirdest part. I felt like my senses were being enhanced, including my sight, which was always poor, thus my nerdy wire-frame glasses. I also noticed these weird silky ooze strands coming out from under the bedsheets that seemed to come from where my arms & legs had been, almost as if I had been sweating it out or secreting it in some other gross biological way. On the second evening, I started having weird dreams of a giant spider talking to me, it was so big & so powerful looking black and purple wolf spider, with a scarlet web design on its body. It was so huge and terrifying awe-inspiring, it made the acromantula Aragog out of Harry Potter look like a larval housefly in comparison (yes I read those). I was freaked out at first when I discovered I was tied down to a giant sticky web. with several spiders with downward fangs & what appeared to be glowing rattles/magical ceremonial tools attached ot it

"Don't be alarmed Peter Parker. My name is Wolf Widow, & you will not be harmed by me or my children... in fact soon you shall have more power & control than you could ever dream of. Your life will undergo a most miraculous and meaty metamorphosis into a new way of life. All you have to do is hear me out", the giant spider now known as Wolf Widow reverberated in a surprisingly deep resonance that sounded like a human jazz singer mixed with a calm, collected, and understanding mentor figure. It was strangely calming, despite the monstrous appearance of my would-be tormenter.

“Okay I'm listening, but only since this has to be a dream.” I respond shakily.

“This is no dream Peter Parker, for when you wake up you will remember every detail that happens & as proof, look where the spider from the place known as Oscorp bit you & look at the wound under a microscope & you’ll find that it looks different from before, very different.” Wolf Widow explained, “Back to the matter at hand, you have always been uncomfortable & powerless in your own body, but taste a tidbit of what could be done with our power once you meet the Manipulator of Life and your ideals & dreams can come true once you work with him. His name is Parker, Parker Porter. he will join you in the midpoint of the areas where you have been wronged, ridiculed, & bullied for most of your life. Now Leap, Spinner, help me show him his future. BEHOLD!.” Then the spider Wolf Widow’s eyes started to convulse & spiral, while his children, Leap & Spinner cocooned me up while placing a special cloth blindfold over my eyes (that appeared to be made of spider-silk as well). Even though my vision of Wolf Widow was covered, it felt as though he were still looking at me with all eight of those beady eyes.

I was petrified with fear & shivering despite being bundled up with really warm spider-silk cloth in a cocoon. I was about to be eaten, then as I felt the puncture marks on my hand burn, I awoke…

“Ooh, what a weird dream?!?!?!?” I sighed in relief, only to remember this dream/nightmare in full sensory perception, & the strangest nagging urge to loo underneath my microscope at the wound where the Oscorp spider bit me. I consider myself a very intelligent teenager, & I am very detailed-oriented in the broader scope of science. However when I looked at the spider bite on my hand, what happened next was stunning visual for all the senses… What happened?
11133111121.title: Peter Parker=Spiderman's Origin Sequence

111331111212.content:
I felt my body reverberating as if I were a giant tuning fork & it sent out a subharmonic pulse of sound that seemed to rattle the foundation of my house, yet no one noticed, then I heard scurrying & crawling. I looked under my bed & saw a huge mound of bugs crawling up my legs clearly thinking I was some sort of meal. I’ll admit, I was scared out of my mind: one, I didn’t know what that surreal dream/nightmare was about or why I had it; two, I barely got a look at my wound under my microscope, it looked was like I was spliced with bug DNA, without becoming a freak of nature; & now three, I somehow have summoned an army of insects & arachnids which are insisting carrying me out of my room to a dark, creepy, crawly underworld beneath my house. I wished I had never touched that spider to begin with, but then I noticed I wasn’t feeling numbed or in pain from the bites, it actually felt kind of relaxing as they were somehow sedating me to sleep with both venoms & a sort subharmonic voice singing a lullaby to me, one that though I didn’t recognize, felt almost real. Subconsciously I realized that this must be bug pheromones working it’s magic on me.

When I awoke, I discovered I was in a soft, silky hammock-like cocoon that covered everything below the neck so that I could sense my surroundings even if I wasn’t able to turn my neck very much. From what I could gather it appeared as though I was in a massive, dark, underground cavern network that looked like it was built by trillions or more different species of bugs & worms with lots of burrows & holes that seemed to be filled with larvae, a lot more real, and a lot more gross than anything they show on National Geographic or the Discovery Channel. There were also dozens, upon hundreds, upon thousands of roots & mycelia from plants & mushrooms, & from two of those mycelia coming out of the walls & hooking into each other, my hammock cocoon was hanging along with more webs, & silk strands as thick as metal cables for architecture. Then just like in my dream, I saw him again, Wolf Widow, though I didn’t recognize the human riding on top of him, it was clearly a human with vast power over bugs.

“Don’t be scared. I know you were taken, but I promise you will leave here with greater understanding & power for yourself than ever before. Just hear me out.” the young human spoke in an adolescent voice, it was a teenager like me. “I was an ordinary human like you once, My name was Parker Porter, now I am BioMana, the Manipulator of Life, Empowerment to the Innocent, & the Bane of Death & Evil. I released that mutated spider from Oscorp so that it may find & bite a suitable host to embody its power. The Agent of Power bit you Peter, that’s why you had that dream last night, this is both magic & science working together to create greater powers & enhancing the lives of sapient beings. But for the power to work, you must be made bigger Peter.” Parker or BioMana, spoke with such glee & elation, you’d think it was his birthday & he was sharing one of his presents with me, not conducting some freaky experiment/magic ceremony to alter my body to his whims.

“Look, I appreciate the idea & the offer. But what do you mean by making me bigger? Ummph…” I responded only to find that somehow a series of ants & larvae were using their pheromones to paralyze my head, leaving me even more helpless than before as they forced this sweet & colorless goo into my mouth & I quickly realized it was pheromones, powerful pheromones that only bugs should have. I was being force-fed this substance by the quart into my underweight & weak body. I didn’t realize how powerful this must be because strangely, I may have subconsciously LIKED IT!!! At least, if my hard-on meant anything.

I couldn’t see my body until after the transformation, but I knew I hadn’t even attempted exercise since yesterday & now this kid was force feeding me some strange & delicious substance that was supposed to make me bigger, but I think he meant fatter. I was really bloated & then they released me from my hammock prison, giving me a good look at myself as they brought out a giant mirror for me to look at. How much bigger was I…
